騕字的基本解释

騕
yǎo
〔騕??（
ni僶 ）〕古代良马名。

騕字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yǎo］
［《廣韻》烏皎切，上篠，影。］
见“騕褭”。

騕字的康熙字典解释

【亥集上】【馬字部】　騕； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1441第13
【廣韻】烏皎切【集韻】伊鳥切，?音杳。【玉篇】騕褭，良馬。【司馬相如·上林賦】罥騕褭。【註】騕褭，神馬，日行萬里。　亦作?。

騕字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
騕字的起名意思

古代良马名。

騕
Basic explanation of words
騕
yǎo
〔騕?? (
ni僶)] The name of a good horse in ancient times.
騕
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yǎo］
["Guangyun" Wu Jiaoqie, Shang Xiao, shadow. ]
See "騕褭".
騕
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Haiji 1】【Horse Character Department】　騕; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 1441 and 13
[Guang Yun] Wu Jiao Qi [Ji Yun] Yi Niao Qi,? [Jade articles] 騕褭, good horse. 【Sima Xiangru·Shanglin Fu】Right and elegant. [Note] Yizhen, a god horse, travels thousands of miles a day.　 also for?.
騕

The name of an ancient good horse.
